projects.name: Web CV
info: Here I have created my web curriculum in Angular 13 to be able to show who I am, what experience I have, my training and some personal work done.

projects.name: Search And Find
info: This is the project I did for the end of the module.In it, I developed an application for buying and selling homes in which a user can register and publish a property or buy and / or request information about any of the available homes.

projects.name: Portfolio
info: Here I have attached a dossier with some of my works as a layout designer and graphic designer, click on the link to see them.
